description: Scammer impersonates SBI bank officer claiming account will be blocked due to incomplete KYC. Attempts to extract UPI ID and bank details.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your SBI account will be BLOCKED within 24 hours due to incomplete KYC verification. Update immediately to avoid account suspension. -SBI Bank

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh no beta waht happened? i dont know how to do kyc online i am very old... pls help me i dont want my pension account to block... waht do i have to do? how do i update it beta pls tell me

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Madam this is urgent matter. I am calling from SBI head office Mumbai. Your account ending 4521 is showing KYC pending. Please verify your details to continue banking services.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh god sir i am so worried my pension comes in this... i dont want it to stop... i have my cards and everything here... do i need to give you my aadhaar number? i have it here its 277155498058... pls tell me waht to do next... do i have to pay any fee for this kyc?

turns.scammer_message: For verification, please share your registered mobile number and we will send OTP. Or you can directly update by paying Rs.10 verification fee to UPI ID: sbi.kyc.update@ybl

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i will pay the 10 rupees... my phone number is 9892155432... i typed sbi.kyc.update@ybl in the app but waht name should show there? i want to confirm before sending so i dont make mistake... pls tell me the name beta

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir, just pay Rs.10 to sbi.kyc.update@ybl and your KYC will be updated within 2 hours. Also note down our helpline number for any queries: 9876543210

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s)
api_response.agentResponse: i have saved the number 9876543210 thank you beta... but i am stuck on teh payment page... i typed teh id but it is showing one name... is it 'Sarkari KYC' or something else? pls tell me exactly waht name should show so i dont send 10 rupees to wrong person... my hands are shaking a bit

turns.scammer_message: If UPI not working, you can transfer to our verification account. Account number 50100123456789, IFSC: HDFC0001234, Name: SBI KYC Services. Amount is only Rs.10.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i will try to add this account... but it is asking for account holder name and i wrote sbi kyc services but it says name is too long... is there any person name i can use instead? also beta why is it showing hdfc bank when you are from sbi head office... i am getting very confused and my head is spinning... pls tell me waht to do
